Hero.subtitle: I transform ideas into high-impact digital solutions. My goal is simple: to deliver results that drive your growth and set you apart in the market.

Services.title: An Ecosystem of Solutions Tailored to You
Services.subtitle: From concept to deployment, I offer a range of technological services to boost your project.
Services.service1_desc: Custom, robust, and scalable web and mobile solutions with a user-centered design.
Services.service2_desc: I integrate AI models to automate processes, gain insights, and create personalized experiences.
Services.service3_desc: I transform interaction with the real world through immersive and interactive AR experiences.
Services.service4_desc: I create digital twins and process simulations to optimize production and reduce costs.

RealEstate.title: Solutions for Real Estate and Architecture
RealEstate.subtitle: Interactive visualizations and immersive experiences that bring your projects to life before they are built.
RealEstate.project2_title:
The world's most advanced
NeRF 3D generation technology

Industrial.title: Industrial Analytics Dashboard
Industrial.subtitle: Optimize processes and predict outcomes through motion simulation, data analysis, and interactive visualizations.
Industrial.chart1_desc: Comparison of leads generated vs. sales closed.
Industrial.card1_desc: Visualize and optimize assembly lines, logistics flows, or any industrial process to identify bottlenecks and improve efficiency before physical implementation.
Industrial.card2_desc: Create virtual replicas of your assets for real-time monitoring, predictive maintenance, and risk-free scenario testing for production.
Industrial.card3_desc: Transform raw data from sensors and machinery into actionable insights through interactive dashboards that display key performance indicators of your operation.

MachineLearning.title: Machine Learning Case Studies
MachineLearning.subtitle: Visualizations of Machine Learning models to demonstrate their application in real-world problems like classification, segmentation, and genetic optimization.
MachineLearning.card1_desc: Predicting customer churn using Logistic Regression.
MachineLearning.card1_footer_desc: The model learns to draw an invisible 'boundary' that effectively separates customers who are likely to churn from those who will stay, enabling proactive retention actions.

Ecommerce.title: Dynamic and Modern E-commerce
Ecommerce.subtitle: From animated product catalogs to interactive shopping carts, I create online shopping experiences that turn visitors into customers.

Contact.title: Let's Talk About Your Project
Contact.subtitle: Chat with my AI assistant to define your needs and get a preliminary proposal in minutes.
Contact.chat_greeting: Hello! I'm OneJoan's virtual assistant. I'm here to help you outline your project and provide you with an initial proposal. To get started, what's your name and what kind of project are you thinking of?

Footer.subtitle: High-impact digital solutions to take your business to the next level.
